name: Dream Scythe
description:
General Flavor Choices/Descriptions

Whipped Cream & Marshmallow TFA - These two in combination create a super creamy, fluffy texture and some sweetness

Blood Orange FW - A nice natural orange flavor bordering almost on the rindyness, but not quite.

Vanilla Swirl TFA - Chosen for that nice vanilla flavor, without being a custard. In combo with whipped cream and marshmallow tfa makes a nice vanilla cream flavor.

Super Sweet CAP - Sweetening the juice up to really give it that ice cream pop sickle sweetness.
author: Sublimeice
